duties_responsibilities.duty: Produce high-quality translations, gists, and sight translations of collected material from foreign language to English and vice versa.
Use a variety of Microsoft (MS) Office software programs as well as Adobe Acrobat and other tools to track information and report on collected material.
Conduct sight translations and verbal gists of foreign language materials into English.
Leverage knowledge of the language, culture, politics, military, economy, and current events of regions of interest.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in a related field and 5 years of foreign language experience.
Top Secret/SCI (TS/SCI) Clearance is required. Must be a US Citizen.
